name: Forbidden Confessions: My Lucky Charm
description:
About

As the 4th entry of our Forbidden Confessions series, My Lucky Charm entails the confession story of Keith, a 26-year-old man living alone in an apartment in Charlotte, North Carolina.

One day, a mysterious girl named Hailey arrived at Keith's doorstep, which eventually lead to a series of encounters and affairs.

Is Hailey's arrival a misfortune or the product of something else?
